Summary._: Some southbound [R] via [F] line from Roosevelt Av to Lex Av-63 St then via [Q] line to 57 St-7 Av because of signal problems at Queens Plaza.

Description._: Some southbound [R] via [F] line from Roosevelt Av to Lex Av-63 St then via [Q] line to 57 St-7 Av because of signal problems at Queens Plaza.

LongDescription:
Some southbound [R] trains are running along the [F] line from Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av to Lexington Av-63 St then via the [Q] line to 57 St-7 Av because of signal problems at Queens Plaza.
Our crews are on the scene working to fix it as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated
Expect delays in [F], [M],[Q] and [R] train service.

Summary._: Some southbound [W] via [Q] line between 57 St-7 Av and 96 St because of signal problems at 5 Av-59 St.

Description._: Some southbound [N] via [Q] line between 57 St-7 Av and 96 St because of signal problems at 5 Av-59 St.

LongDescription:
Some [N] trains are running along the [Q] line between 57 St-7 Av and 96 St in both directions.
[W] trains are running along the [Q] line between 57 St-7 Av and 96 St in both directions.
Southbound [R] trains are running along the [F] line from Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av to Lexington Av-63 St then via [Q] line to 57 St-7 Av.
These service changes are because of signal problems at 5 Av-59 St.
Customers should expect longer wait times and crowd conditions on [E], [F], [N], [Q], [R] and [W] lines.
